selected_articles.title: Trump plans to launch more tariffs on April 2. Here’s what it could mean for you
selected_articles.snippet: President Donald Trump has repeatedly called April 2 “Liberation Day,” with promises to roll out a set of tariffs, or taxes on imports from other countries,...

selected_articles.title: Trump has dubbed April 2 ‘Liberation Day’ for his tariffs. Here’s what to expect
selected_articles.snippet: As the trade wars launched by U.S. President Donald Trump continue to escalate, all eyes are on Wednesday.

selected_articles.title: Trump to Unveil Country-Based Tariffs April 2 in Rose Garden
selected_articles.snippet: President Donald Trump will announce his reciprocal tariff push on Wednesday during an event in the White House Rose Garden, his top spokeswoman said.
